metadata.title: CVE-2023-45232 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to an infinite loop vulnerabilitywhen parsing unknown options in the Destination Options header of IPv6.This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorizedaccess and potentially lead to a loss of Availability.

criterions.comment: edk2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
